name: Charles Croll
text: Seated and served quickly.Staff very friendly and helpful with special food request gluten free pizza crust available.We will be back.

name: Tristyn Klein`
text: Great place. Recommend getting the Pretzel bites. They have a great crisp outside with a nice night and fluffy inside. The beer cheese is very good as well when combined with there pretzels. If you are not a fan of Parmesan I …More

name: William Buckley
text: One of the best pizzas I have enjoyed in the Lowcountry. Excellent service, fully masked.

name: Michelle Mostiler
text: Our server was friendly and polite. I was able to order gluten free with no problem. The food was delicious. If you go ask for Cylie or Cara.

name: Brandon Orndorff
text: Great food selection and the staff is very nice and attentive.  The location itself was very cold inside leaving us all cold even with coats on.  To be fair this winter has been colder than most.  Their food is great for carnivores and Vegetarians alike.

name: David Meador
text: Staff was nice, but no refills for me. Food wasn't bad, but wasn't special either.

name: Lorraine Daniels
text: great service a bit slow, but it was a beautiful Saturday night and they were very busy.  Pizza was delish.

name: Ken Marchi
text: Best pizza I have had in years, outstanding.

name: Curtis M
text: This is our usual goto spot for pizza. Not sure there is anything better in Bluffton. A tad spendy however.

name: Jonathan Mann
text: So freaking good, cheap, and the waitress was super adorable. Go there, I demand it.

name: L Rynhart
text: Really amazing pizza for the price. Good local drinks and local IPAs. Had good time with friends. Social atmosphere and great customer service.

name: Gary Davis
text: Consistent food quality and service everytime!

name: Rachel Willis
text: Pizza was absolutely delicious! Everytime I go back they get better and better!

name: Michael McMahon
text: Great service and food! Server Trey was excellent 😊

name: Robi Malone
text: Not the best gluten free pizza. My hubby's calzone was so so.

name: Sarah McCall
text: Love this location!! The staff are beyond attentive and helpful. We have only had one "mess up" here and the managers noted it, and when we were ordering our next take out meal they remembered and compensated the entire meal for the mishap. …More

name: Barbara Miller
text: Clean environment with excellent food and service!

name: Chuck C
text: Great food and good service.

name: Raven Weakley
text: Always great food and good vibes.

name: Mandee Ungerer
text: I love Everytime I come here. They have an awesome draft list and vegan options. Great staff, not overbearing with wondering if we're ok but pay enough attention to when you run out of something. Love this place!

name: Bill Parker
text: The food was good and the service was good. The prices are about the same as every other restaurant in the area. If you are looking for something a little different, then you should give them a try.

name: Thomas Mcdowell
text: Mellow mushroom is awesome! Great pizza and sandwiches , nice beer selection and friendly staff

name: constance muellenbach
text: Pizza was awesome. This place has great pizza and I love the relaxing atmosphere. Definitely on my best pizza list.

name: janice marx
text: Service could have been better.  Had to wait for a while & ended up asking another server to bring us oregano seasoning.  The original server did come back & informed us that the second server was on her way with the oregano & she came shortly after.  We had meatball sandwiches - mediocre.  We had better.  It was OK in a pinch.

name: James Faris
text:
Outstanding pizza.   Our favorite pizza restaurant.  And the people are
very nice folks to deal with.

name: Gene Schaeffer
text: It's not Chicago pizza (guess where I come from) but it's  very good pizza with more options to add then I ever saw. I ate a small which is more than enough for 1 person - and had 7 toppings. Service is great. Vegetables are fresh for toppings. This is a great place to enjoy or carry out pizza. If you haven't yet - try it for sure.

name: Beth B
text: I ♡ Mellow Mushroom. This location can do better. I'm going to give them another try in 2020...

name: Terri Smith
text: Service was good and nice ambience but I could find better pizza somewhere else. I ordered the slice and chose bell pepper and onion for my topping. They must make the cheese pizza ahead of time and just throw on the toppings. They weren't …More
Expensive, not worth the price, but good beer , food is ok but not worth the money

name: Justin Head Cheese Thompson
text: I was there from Ohio for my youngest son's Marine graduation. Great pizza, friendly staff. Wonderful!!!

name: Jason Harden
text: Love Mellow mushroom and always seek it out when traveling. Pizza was great and service was top notch.

name: V and D
text: We had a great waitress, the Calzone was great, and the Greek salad was excellent.

name: Rose Gomez
text: First time out since quarantine! NIA WAS Awesome! We will be back!

name: Hope Wade
text: The food was fresh.

name: Krystyne Ann
text: Amazing food, service, and cleanliness. A must try!

name: Jason Sapp
text: Great food and great service

name: Lyndsey Brown
text: Best pizza place that my husband and I have found! Love it,  it's so good. Price wise it's a little bit pricey but well worth it,  honestly!

name: jose renteria
text: Food was great as always. And my kids loved the Halloween decorations all over the restaurant. Very pleased with the service as well.

name: Beth Medlin
text: Food was great.  Love the atmosphere at this location, a very Key West feel.  It was a Friday night and the bar was full.  We prefer dining at the bar anywhere we go, and did so this night.  Staff was attentive.

name: Theresa G
text: Went on a Monday afternoon. Certainly had our choice of seats or booths. Excellent choices for me who wants to minimize mest consumption. Excellent. Highly recommend. For this out of towner it was not so easy to find.

name: Miriam Smith
text: By far the best pizza in town.

name: Lori Baden
text: Their steak and cheese calzone is the bomb. And Madison the bartender, is even better.

name: Daniel Connelly
text: awesome selection of beer and of course the Pizza is delicious.

name: doni finch
text: We have eaten at several of their locations and we have never been disappointed. Especially if you are gluten free. The Bluffton location was just around the corner from my house and always busy, clean and tasty. Thanks ✌

name: Jack Aldrich
text: Hands down the philosopher" pizza steak and cheese almost a Greek pizza white sauce so good!

name: Sridhar called Sri aka Dr.JustKidding Rangaswamy
text: Tabetha does an Outstanding job. Best Bartender in the town. As you see I speak my mind bluntly. I was not asked to write. Please inform the management please

name: Kevin Bandlow
text: Thos is some of, if not the best pizza I have ever had in my life! Staff was so friendly and helpful.  Had a small hiccup with one of the meals, staff was very apologetic,  offered a free appetizer while waiting for the retire. Amazing place!!!

name: michael kiritsy
text: If u like pizza u must stop here and try the mello! Kool laidback vibe,nice people, good food well prepared.

name: Jeffrey Evans
text: Food and service was exceptional! We loved the White rabbit and meat calzone. The server was very friendly, accommodating, and efficient! A+

name: Joseph horowitz
text: Great pizza. Kids loved it. My cheesesteak was yummy too. Full bar. Nice people. Glad we stopped.

name: Lori Vaught
text: Excellent pizza.  We ordered a regular and a gluten free pizza.  Both came out in a reasonable amount of time and were very good and piping hot.  My husband commented that it was the best pizza he had in a long tiime.

name: Greg
text: Good food at a very fair price. My sub had a good amount of meat.

name: stella ganschow
text: Calzone was the best I'm from New York and I know calzones if you go ask for Lindsey the waitress very helpful as I'd the rest of crew salads also very good

name: Stephen Pitts
text: Food was good, usually is. Not too sure about the paper straws though.

name: Vix kay
text: Food and drinks were yummy! Enjoyed the night out with friends.

name: Michele Dubbs
text: Best pizza around.  The salads are pretty awesome too.

name: Michael Ponder
text: Nikki our serve was awesome. Would recommend to friends and family. Great food

name: Chris Bandlow
text: Super creative menu. Excellent pizza!

name: Cody Frost
text: The Boyce family provided Pizzas for the company I work for while we were on the job site. Mellow Mushroom has the best Pizza and I would recommend it to anyone!

name: Julie Watson Jones
text: Great service, great pizza and Caesar salad, fun atmosphere!

name: Jacob Kubnick
text: Good food and good service

name: Laura Bookout
text: Got there before the dinner rush. Quickly greeted, seated, and offered drinks. Good specials. We ordered an appetizer and a pizza to split. The app came out hot and delicious. We had time to sit and enjoy before the pizza was served. …More

name: Filip Belka
text: Local fav

name: Linda Mann
text: It was very good and more than we could eat

name: Sharon Horowitz
text: Our thin crust mushroom pizza was delicious.

name: Tonya Moore
text: Great food, service, and atmosphere!  Liquid Mary Jane is a must-have drink!

name: Betsy Steinwedel
text: Enjoyed the chef salad and mushroom calzone.   Server was attentive.

name: Tim O'Connor
text: Great service along with the GREAT food!

name: Steph W
text: First time trying Mellow Mushroom! Sooo good! The bruschetta was good, but the Holy Shiitake Pizza was absolutely DIVINE! A white pizza with a bunch of mushrooms on a white sauce covering a fantastically made, perfect pizza crust. The server was very helpful and patient. Will return!

name: Ed Mamba
text: Service was in impeccable.  My hubby clumsily spilled his drink and the lovely waitress promptly brought over a large stack of napkins and helped clean the mess not only that but also bought over another beer. The pizza was hot, cheesy, …More

name: Mandy Parsons
text: We love Mellow Mushroom! This is one of my family's regular stops. You can't go wrong with any of the menu items and we always have great service. We have also used the online option for ordering takeout. Extremely convenient!

name: Thank You
text: Look how awesome the salad is... Love the pizza but also love the salads... Staff is great

name: stephani crosby
text: Service was good. Food tasted great.

name: Henry Blaskowski
text: Great crust and a good selection of fresh toppings.

name: Sandie Parrott
text:
Great everything! And gluten free......!
Many restaurants say they have gluten free options, but that just means salads. Good tasting gluten free pizza is rare...and they have it! (Although I'm still …More

name: Kathryn Pettipas
text: Poor,  I got a steak and cheese hoagie which was very dry, meat was overcooked, barely any cheese. I threw most of it away.

name: Jean Summers
text: Great pizza with lots of vegan  options.  Helpful staff. Always consistent and tasty...

name: Rod Parker
text: Wonderful lunch for family of 8!  Pizza was great with salads.  Staff were responsive with drinks.

name: Traci McAllister
text: Great service but the pizza or wings has no flavor I won’t come back😒

name: Austin Williams
text: Great food and great service

name: Will Barnes
text: Mellow mushroom Bluffton served us the day hurricane Dorian left Bluffton with a skeleton crew. Did an awesome job!

name: James Ranck
text: Excellent pizza and service. Will definitely be going back.

name: Jason Allcreator
text: Not a big fan of there pizza. Wings are nice.

name: Ed Reedy
text: Food is always great with friendly staff

name: LaVePu -

name: Brian Andrews
text: Great Calzone! Looking forward to the next one!

name: Mark Farley

name: ana sandi

name: Jo Go
text: Amazing food, great happy hour prices.

name: Andrea Breeding
text: Mellow Mushroom never disappoints. Had the chicken hoagie, was great. My friend had pizza. Always good. Can't go wrong with anything you order. They have a variety of menu items even if you don't want pizza.

name: Debbie Paul

name: Scott Hoffman
text: Good experiance. Greek salad great. Pizza great. Beer pretty good prices. The game was on. Service was great. Our new go to.

name: Glenda Harris
text: Yummy always. Get some.

name: James Tower
text: This is by far the best place to go for a few drinks, food and a lot of laughs!  Bingo on Tuesday is so much fun!

name: Michael Cortigine
text: Very friendly service.  Pizza was good sandwiches and salads good . Would definitely recommend.

name: Samuel Helser
text: Great place to go eat if you're in the area.  Great pizza Great wings and the service was awesome! 10/10. Family goes everytime we are in the Hilton Head Area

name: Dawn Poteete

name: Larnell Miller
text: The atmosphere is great for a small restaurant. The bar is very nice also. Their Pizza is very good. I especially love the meatballs. 😎

name: Quentin Ellis
text: Great pizza even greater crew the young lady who waited on us was fantastic. You could tell she was a seasoned waitress in knew what she was doing and enjoyed it.

name: Luke D
text: Decent establishment & service. Wasn't quite same quality as other mellow locations.

name: B Jennings
text: Great food and service as always!

name: Will White
text: Food was ok, the breast is tasty, but too soft. The service was lackluster. We waited a long time to get our order taken and then waited even longer for our appetizer. What made it really bad is that a couple that was seated next to us, who got sat after us and had their order taken before us.

name: Barbara O. Olsen
text: Great pizza.  Good service for our large group.

name: Brooke Woody
text: The service was very slow and our bacon pizza was burnt.

name: Barbara Farley
text: Love this restaurant,  have been to hhi and bluffton ones.  Great pizza and atmosphere both places

name: Gary Thurber
text: First time here. Hard to find good pizza in this area. Waitress made some good suggestions which we tried. Also had the jerk chicken sandwich. Best I have ever had.

name: Anna Kirby
text: The first time we came here it was amazing and this time was also great except food was way understalted. Service was great as always and the decor and atmosphere is always a blast! We came in a a big group of ten for a birthday and they accomodated us great. Will definitely be returning.

name: Michael Dery
text: I went there got 10 wings, and 2 bloody Mary's. Total $28. The wings were horrible to the point I only ate 4 out of the 10. Place is a complete rip off.

name: Pamela Kelly
text: We go for the GF pizza, it's good nothing special.   I haven't tried anything else so that's why 3 stars.

name: micah kiley
text: Love the after hours menu starting at 10:00 p.m. and solid draught selection. Pretty sure they put crack in the beer cheese because...well it's good.

name: Bob
text: Good classic crust pizza did not like the thin crust so much!

name: Diana Boccella
text: Cylie is the best waitress!

name: Rene Gilman
text: Hands down some of the best pizza ever

name: Keisha Polite
text: This is the best pizza place I ever been to.  They had options for vegans and for people who eat animal in general. Our waiter who was Amanda was really friendly thanks for your great service

name: Alix Lund
text: The quality of the food depends on the time of day but most servers are really quick and helpful. They happily accommodate big groups as well.

name: Alandria Johnson
text: Greatest service staff.... EVER! Everyone was super friendly, attentive and accommodating when my son and I visited last Sunday night. The food was great but I was so impressed by the great attitude and manners of our waiter that he was one …More

name: Kristan Luft
text: Great pizza! Highly recommend the holy shiitake if you are a mushroom fan!

name: Carlos Vargas
text: Our first time here, the food and service were all really good. We will make this our go to pizza place on the island. No other pizza places compares.

text: Great customer service and really good drinks

name: Robert DiCioccio
text:
Delicious Pizza
And the waiter Jeremy was awesome

name: Deborah Brown
text: Good service good food

name: William Moore
text: Don't really know the differe6between sundried tomatoes and roasted.

name: v c
text:
This is the best pizza in Bluffton we came from up
North and this pizza is the closest taste to what we are use to and love. Also the Greek salads are great and fresh and the decor here is funky and cool we love this place!! Prices are a little high but good food.

name: Koz Family
text: Absolutely fantastic food and service!  Calzone was delicious.

name: James Wonsey
text: Excellent atmosphere

text: I love discovering a Mellow Mushroom in a new city because I enjoy the pizza SO. MUCH. This one did not disappoint.

name: Daniel Harms
text: Took over an hour for a half order of pretzels, a small and a medium pizza for pickup. Ordered at 7:15 on a Monday, got the order at 8:20. Told it would be a 30 min wait, but was double plus that. No apology, no offer for a beverage while I …More

name: Micky n Mallory show
text: Awesome food and great service!!

name: Daniel Edgell
text: Friendly staff. Food quality consistent with any other Mellow Mushroom location I've been in. I wish they had a larger sign by the access road so I would know that it was there, but apparently all restaurants on this road have that same issue. City planners... Sheesh.

name: Nellie J. Mcguigan
text: The salads and pizza is wonderful.

name: Blake B
text: I think the service was excellent and trust me I have been to slow resturants. They have great food and the most wonderful and nice staff. Also most importantly the food, the food has great taste and texture. I don't think the service is …More

name: ERIC RUSSELL
text: New to the area and was recommended to us. Phenomenal pizza but the service was less then ideal. Wait time wasn't an issue but the server wasn't as knowledgeable about the menu and beers as she probably should have been. Def recommend this pizzeria because the food was great, we will be going back in the future

name: Dan Reger
text: Great pizza and atmosphere.

name: David Vincent Young
text: Half-price bottle of wine on Wednesday the pizza was awesome the salad was awesome the artichoke that was awesome

name: Michelle Thompson
text: I love their appetizers and salads

text:
The salad was very fresh .  However.  The cost for toppings was ridiculous . 1.99 per topping
Way overpriced. …More

name: Sandra Youngblood
text: Excellent!

name: Mark Cleveland
text: The pizzas in my opinion either needed to cook a little longer or either they put the toppings on after it came out of the oven. The pizzas were big & plenty of toppings. Service was good

name: Ray Alicea
text: Best pizza in the area!

name: KATHLEEN CASEY
text: It was pleasant....would have enjoy some background music while dining outside on the patio. Service was good A manda our server was pleasant and attentive. Had the house soup....very tasty

name: Dave Kelly
text: Best pizza and beer selection around. Staff is super friendly and the General Manager is simply the best! Always outgoing and friendly to my daughter!

name: Linda Stein
text: I'm from Baltimore but always get a pizza when I'm in the area. You can't go wrong!

name: Lenny Giarratano
text: Mellow Mushroom specialty pizzas are very very good. If you are after a traditional pizza with just red sauce and cheese type of thing this probably isn't the best option. But some of the specialty pizzas are really outstanding.

text: Great good and TONS on the menu

name: Moninder Gulati

name: Debbie Hobbs

name: Dean Heinz
text: Food was great as always.  However, the bar service sucked after 5:00PM.  If you weren't a regular, good luck on getting any service at the bar.  I  ended up waiting  25min for my first beer refill 'cause the little girl was too busy …More

name: Sandra Shapiro
text: Service and food were excellent. Unfortunately the young crew cleaning up throughout the meal, provided a major distraction by sliding all the chairs out from under the tables and back, causing continuous loud screeching while eating and trying to have a converstion with my dining companion.

name: Bill Bogle Jr.
text: Love the Veg Out. Really tasty, good crust, lots of cheese and vegetables.

name: Ann Buckley
text: Great food! Lots if options! Love the pizza! Tons of options!  My favorite is the spinach artichoke dip! Ask for extra bread for the dip! Fun atmosphere!

text: Food and service was awesome. I truly enjoyed the new ice pops- salted caramel!!!!

text: Good experience,great shiitake mushroom pizza,only issue is the silly angled bowls they serve their salads in...They slide and tip over very easily

name: Kevin Manning
text: Great sub's and Bar!

name: James Brantley
text: Great place to hang out, and food is consistently amazing. Kyle, the kitchen manager, runs a tight ship and fantastic food every single time. Highly recommend this Mellow Mushroom over others even.

name: James Tower
text: Wonderful people! Great atmosphere

name: Joe Twaddle
text: Jessica was great, even when I was drinking my unsweetened tea to fast, never left my family and I hanging..Food was great as usual. Going to miss the Bluffton MM we are moving to Tenn, this week. So keep up the great work y'all

text: Excellent pizza, fast friendly service.

name: Donna Noe

text: Cheese Pizza ok good for kids service ok just think that a place with mushrooms in its name would have some good mushrooms on their pie. I had a pie with mushrooms. Sliced and thrown on top not sautéed not seasoned just bland and tasteless …More

text: Nice staff, good happy hour nice food

name: Kenneth Tillman

name: Jeremy H
text: Always a fan of the mushroom. Been to a bunch of locations, but never this one until yesterday. Left pleased. Quick, attentive service and consistently good food.

name: Karen Mullins
text: We love Mellow Mushroom’s pizza! The Holy Shitake is a must try for mushroom lovers. Fast, friendly service.

name: Felicia Bale
text: Very tasty Pizza! Quality ingredients obvious bin every bite!!

name: Aroh Barjatya
text: Over priced for what they offer. The service was sub-par as well. We specifically said no sour cream on soup....twice... and yet they put a dollop of it in. That said, the hoagie was fine.

name: lynette corder
text: Great food and a great waitress who was very friendly and attentive.  Her awesome personality just added to our positive dining experience.  We will be back!  Thanks, Sasha!

name: Miriam

text: Great food for people that want something unique and great for the classics as well.
